name: eSpark, Inc.
description: Provider of an iPad and web-based educational platform designed to transform academic goals with differentiated instruction. The company's web-based educational platform curate learning resources to create a personalized learning experience for each student, enabling teachers to meet the needs of every learner and transform classrooms with technology.
one_liner: Provider of an iPad and web-based educational platform designed to transform academic goals with differentiated instruction. The company's web-based educational platform curate learning resources to create a personalized learning experience for each student, enabling teachers to meet the needs of every learner and transform classrooms with technology.
